mods.abstract: Home recorded performances from the WWVA Jamboree, featuring Big Slim, The Lone Cowboy and Hank Snow, recorded on January 30, 1947 on radio station WWVA (Wheeling, W. Va).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
